Posts.Content: On 8/21/2009 TurtleTAM wrote: May - I should probably also mention that I fell in the 20% of cancerous micro-calcifications. I had no symptoms, no pain, no one felt a lump during exams and I fell into no category for high risk. There were just suspicious spots on my mammogram. I chose the biopsy for peace of mind. The time waiting for the results of the biopsy was excruciating but knowing for sure was so much better than not knowing. TAM Tam, Did you have any additional surgeries?  Were you actually diagnosed with DCIS? FF
Posts.Title: Micro-calcifications

Posts.Content: I am so sorry to hear about your situation.  Would you mind giving some detail as to your previous cancer and the path you took. FreedomFaith
Posts.Title: second time around
